item.title: Sampling is as easy as learning the score: theory for diffusion models with minimal data assumptions
item.description: Lab’s group meeting on December 2.The article Sampling is as easy as learning the score: theory for diffusion models with minimal data assumptions was shared at the group meeting, see the pdf of this slide:Slide.

item.title: SMLD and SDE for diffusion model
item.description:
SMLD and SDE for diffusion model

Lab’s group meeting on August 1 . I summarized two articles about diffusion model by Song Yang:SCORE-BASED GENERATIVE MODELING THROUGH STOCHASTIC DIFFERENTIAL EQUATIONS and Generative Modeling by Estimating Gradients of the Data Distribution . For detailed information, see the pdf of this tutorial:SMLD and SDE.
